general.name: mos_target_skymapper_dr2
general.description: Skymapper Data Release 2 photometry. For detailed descriptions, please see the SkyMapper documentation: https://skymapper.anu.edu.au/table-browser/

surveys.name: BHM
surveys.description: An optical time-domain spectroscopic survey of quasars and X-ray sources

surveys.name: MWM
surveys.description: A time-domain, optical+IR spectroscopic survey of Milky Way stars of all types.

general.naming_convention: $MOS_TARGET/[V_TARG]/mos_target_skymapper_dr2-[NUM].fits, where V_TARG=1.0.1 for DR18; and NUM = 1..1 to partition the file into parts

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

object_id.name: OBJECT_ID
object_id.description: Global unique SkyMapper object ID in the master table

raj2000.name: RAJ2000
raj2000.description: Mean ICRS Right Ascension of the object

dej2000.name: DEJ2000
dej2000.description: Mean ICRS Declination of the object

e_raj2000.name: E_RAJ2000
e_raj2000.description: RMS variation around the mean Right Ascension

e_dej2000.name: E_DEJ2000
e_dej2000.description: RMS variation around the mean Declination

smss_j.name: SMSS_J
smss_j.description: SkyMapper Southern Survey designation of the form SMSS Jhhmmss.ss+/-ddmmss.s

mean_epoch.name: MEAN_EPOCH
mean_epoch.description: Mean MJD epoch of the observations

rms_epoch.name: RMS_EPOCH
rms_epoch.description: RMS variation around the mean epoch

glon.name: GLON
glon.description: Galactic longitude derived from ICRS coordinate

glat.name: GLAT
glat.description: Galactic latitude derived from ICRS coordinate

flags.name: FLAGS
flags.description: Bitwise OR of Source Extractor flags across all observations

nimaflags.name: NIMAFLAGS
nimaflags.description: Total number of flagged pixels from bad, saturated, and crosstalk pixel masks across all observations

ngood.name: NGOOD
ngood.description: Number of observations used across all filters

ngood_min.name: NGOOD_MIN
ngood_min.description: Minimum number of observations used in any filter

nch_max.name: NCH_MAX
nch_max.description: Maximum number of child sources combined into this global object_id in any filter

density.name: DENSITY
density.description: Number of DR2 sources within 15 arcsec (including this source)

u_flags.name: U_FLAGS
u_flags.description: Bitwise OR of Source Extractor flags from u-band measurements in photometry table

u_nimaflags.name: U_NIMAFLAGS
u_nimaflags.description: Number of flagged pixels from bad, saturated, and crosstalk pixel masks from u-band measurements in photometry table

u_nch.name: U_NCH
u_nch.description: Number of u-band child sources combined into this object_id

u_nclip.name: U_NCLIP
u_nclip.description: Number of u-band observations with magnitudes clipped from the final PSF magnitude estimate

v_flags.name: V_FLAGS
v_flags.description: Bitwise OR of Source Extractor flags from v-band measurements in photometry table

v_nimaflags.name: V_NIMAFLAGS
v_nimaflags.description: Number of flagged pixels from bad, saturated, and crosstalk pixel masks from u-band measurements in photometry table

v_nch.name: V_NCH
v_nch.description: Number of v-band child sources combined into this object_id

v_nclip.name: V_NCLIP
v_nclip.description: Number of v-band observations with magnitudes clipped from the final PSF magnitude estimate

g_flags.name: G_FLAGS
g_flags.description: Bitwise OR of Source Extractor flags from g-band measurements in photometry table

g_nimaflags.name: G_NIMAFLAGS
g_nimaflags.description: Number of flagged pixels from bad, saturated, and crosstalk pixel masks from g-band measurements in photometry table

g_nch.name: G_NCH
g_nch.description: Number of g-band child sources combined into this object_id

g_nclip.name: G_NCLIP
g_nclip.description: Number of g-band observations with magnitudes clipped from the final PSF magnitude estimate

r_flags.name: R_FLAGS
r_flags.description: Bitwise OR of Source Extractor flags from r-band measurements in photometry table

r_nimaflags.name: R_NIMAFLAGS
r_nimaflags.description: Number of flagged pixels from bad, saturated, and crosstalk pixel masks from r-band measurements in photometry table

r_nch.name: R_NCH
r_nch.description: Number of r-band child sources combined into this object_id

r_nclip.name: R_NCLIP
r_nclip.description: Number of r-band observations with magnitudes clipped from the final PSF magnitude estimate

i_flags.name: I_FLAGS
i_flags.description: Bitwise OR of Source Extractor flags from i-band measurements in photometry table

i_nimaflags.name: I_NIMAFLAGS
i_nimaflags.description: Number of flagged pixels from bad, saturated, and crosstalk pixel masks from i-band measurements in photometry table

i_nch.name: I_NCH
i_nch.description: Number of i-band child sources combined into this object_id

i_nclip.name: I_NCLIP
i_nclip.description: Number of i-band observations with magnitudes clipped from the final PSF magnitude estimate

z_flags.name: Z_FLAGS
z_flags.description: Bitwise OR of Source Extractor flags from z-band measurements in photometry table

z_nimaflags.name: Z_NIMAFLAGS
z_nimaflags.description: Number of flagged pixels from bad, saturated, and crosstalk pixel masks from z-band measurements in photometry table

z_nch.name: Z_NCH
z_nch.description: Number of z-band child sources combined into this object_id

z_nclip.name: Z_NCLIP
z_nclip.description: Number of a-band observations with magnitudes clipped from the final PSF magnitude estimate

class_star.name: CLASS_STAR
class_star.description: Maximum stellarity index from photometry table (between 0=no star and 1=star)

flags_psf.name: FLAGS_PSF
flags_psf.description: Bitmask indicating whether photometry is likely biased by neighbours at greater than 1%

u_rchi2var.name: U_RCHI2VAR
u_rchi2var.description: Reduced chi-squared for a constant-magnitude model of the u-band PSF magnitude, including clipped sources

v_rchi2var.name: V_RCHI2VAR
v_rchi2var.description: Reduced chi-squared for a constant-magnitude model of the v-band PSF magnitude, including clipped sources

g_rchi2var.name: G_RCHI2VAR
g_rchi2var.description: Reduced chi-squared for a constant-magnitude model of the g-band PSF magnitude, including clipped sources

r_rchi2var.name: R_RCHI2VAR
r_rchi2var.description: Reduced chi-squared for a constant-magnitude model of the r-band PSF magnitude, including clipped sources

i_rchi2var.name: I_RCHI2VAR
i_rchi2var.description: Reduced chi-squared for a constant-magnitude model of the i-band PSF magnitude, including clipped sources

z_rchi2var.name: Z_RCHI2VAR
z_rchi2var.description: Reduced chi-squared for a constant-magnitude model of the z-band PSF magnitude, including clipped sources

ebmv_sfd.name: EBMV_SFD
ebmv_sfd.description: E(B-V) from Schlegel+1998 extinction maps at the ICRS coordinates

dr1_id.name: DR1_ID
dr1_id.description: object_id of closest SkyMapper Data Release 1 source

dr1_dist.name: DR1_DIST
dr1_dist.description: Distance to closest SkyMapper Data Release 1 source

twomass_key.name: TWOMASS_KEY
twomass_key.description: Unique identifier (pts_key) of closest 2MASS PSC source

twomass_dist.name: TWOMASS_DIST
twomass_dist.description: Distance on sky to closest 2MASS PSC source

allwise_cntr.name: ALLWISE_CNTR
allwise_cntr.description: Unique identifier (cntr) of closest AllWISE source

allwise_dist.name: ALLWISE_DIST
allwise_dist.description: Distance on sky to closest AllWISE source

ucac4_mpos.name: UCAC4_MPOS
ucac4_mpos.description: Unique identifier (mpos) of closest UCAC4 source

ucac4_dist.name: UCAC4_DIST
ucac4_dist.description: Distance on sky to closest UCAC4 source

refcat2_id.name: REFCAT2_ID
refcat2_id.description: Unique identifier (objid) of closest ATLAS Refcat2 source

refcat2_dist.name: REFCAT2_DIST
refcat2_dist.description: Distance on sky to closest ATLAS Refcat2 source

ps1_dr1_id.name: PS1_DR1_ID
ps1_dr1_id.description: Unique identifier (objID) of closest Pan-STARRS1 DR1 source

ps1_dr1_dist.name: PS1_DR1_DIST
ps1_dr1_dist.description: Distance on sky to closest Pan-STARRS1 DR1 source

galex_guv_id.name: GALEX_GUV_ID
galex_guv_id.description: Unique identifier (objid) of closest GALEX GUVcat AIS source (Bianchi et al. 2017)

galex_guv_dist.name: GALEX_GUV_DIST
galex_guv_dist.description: Distance on sky to closest GALEX GUVcat AIS source

gaia_dr2_id1.name: GAIA_DR2_ID1
gaia_dr2_id1.description: Unique identifier (source_id) of closest Gaia DR2 source

gaia_dr2_dist1.name: GAIA_DR2_DIST1
gaia_dr2_dist1.description: Distance on sky to closest Gaia DR2 source

gaia_dr2_id2.name: GAIA_DR2_ID2
gaia_dr2_id2.description: Unique identifier (source_id) of second-closest Gaia DR2 source

gaia_dr2_dist2.name: GAIA_DR2_DIST2
gaia_dr2_dist2.description: Distance on sky to second-closest Gaia DR2 source
